entry.title: AKQA, Berlin
entry.content: I joined AKQA's Berlin office in October 2010 as a Senior Web Developer

entry.title: ioko 365
entry.content:
ioko specializes in designing, building and running world-class IT platforms on behalf of large Telecommunications, Media & Entertainment enterprises around the world.

From their site's blurb

A full on technical agency with and strong methodologies and a slant on media broadcasting. I worked as front end developer for the SeeSaw project, both delivery of the current system and scoping and R&D for the next phase.

entry.title: The Team
entry.content: An up and coming agency in lovely Borough Market. They do work for the government and blue chip companies, and hired for front end Drupal development and to work on JQuery widgets.

entry.title: Grand Union
entry.content:
Hired as interim technical director at Grand Union for four months from the last quarter of 2009.

A list of my duties include:

  • Technical architecture and scoping

  • Drafting technical documents

  • Leading teams of developers

  • Liaising with clients and third parties during pitching, scoping, and deployment

  • Hands-on DHTML, Actionscript, PHP, SQL development

  • Brain storming and pitch preparation

entry.title: Billington Cartmell
entry.content: An integrated agency in deeper West London. Worked a couple of weeks providing holiday cover for the technical director, on various projects for Unilever.
